contentTexte:
Find out how to use scanR
to optimize your search results

scanR, the engine of research and innovation, is a web application to help characterize public (research unit of all types, public institutions) and private (companies) structures.

By combining information extracted from the websites of these entities and data from open sources, scanR offers, for nearly 35,000 research actors based in France, a vast set of information to describe and characterize them (publications and theses, involvement in collaborative research projects, spin-off companies, patents, etc.).
